function deriveKeys(a,b,c,d){var e,f,g,h=a+b,i=checkBytes(h);d?(f=sjcl.codec.hex.toBits(d),e=d):(f=sjcl.random.randomWords(16/WORDSIZE),e=sjcl.codec.hex.fromBits(f)),g=c?Math.max(c,5e3):ITERCOUNT+Math.abs(sjcl.random.randomWords(1)[0]%1024);var j=sjcl.misc.pbkdf2(h,f,g),k=Mnemonic.fromSeed(keyToBuffer(j),Mnemonic.Words.ENGLISH),l=recoverKeys(k);return{payload:{username:a,check:i,salt:e,iterations:g},key:l,mnemonic:k.toString()}}function recoverKeys(a){var b=a instanceof keyToBuffer(a){var b=new ArrayBuffer(32),c=new Int32Array(b),d=new Uint8Array(b);Iif(c.length!=a.length)throw new Error("Unexpected length");for(var e=0;e<c.length;e++)c[e]=a[e];return new Buffer(d)}function checkBytes(a){var b=sjcl.hash.sha256.hash(a),c=sjcl.codec.hex.fromBits(b),d=c.slice(-6);return d}function privToWif(a){return bitcore.PrivateKey(a).toWIF()}function wifToPriv(a){var b=new bitcore.PrivateKey(a);return{key:b.toString(),address:b.publicKey.toAddress().toString(),raw:b}}function jwtHeader(a){var b={typ:"JWT",alg:"CUSTOM-BITCOIN-SIGN",kid:a};return base64url.encode(stringify(b))}function signSerialize(a,b,c,d){var e,f,g,h={};return d&&d>0?h.exp=(new Date).getTime()/1e3+d:h.exp=(new Date).getTime()/1e3+3600,h.iat=(new Date).getTime(),h.aud=a,f=base64url.encode(stringify(assign(h,b))),e=jwtHeader(c.address)+"."+f,g=base64url.encode(new Message(e).sign(c.key)),e+"."+g}function validateDeserialize(a,b,c){var d,e,f,g,h,i,j=b.split(".");if(3!=j.length)throw new TypeError("Invalid raw data");if(d=j[0],e=j[1],f=base64url.decode(j[2]),h=JSON.parse(base64url.decode(d)),g=h.kid,!g)throw new TypeError("Invalid header, missing key id");if(!new Message(d+"."+e).verify(g,f))throw new Error("Signature does not match");if(i=JSON.parse(base64url.decode(e)),i.aud!==a)throw new Error("Audience mismatch ("+i.aud+" != "+a+")");if(c&&(new Date).getTime()/1e3>i.exp)throw new Error("Payload expired");return{header:h,payload:i}}var
